TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_tay_Alonzo_Bradley, title = Alonzo_Bradley, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Atayal]}, url = {https://tay.wikipedia.org/wiki/Alonzo_Bradley} }

S.FORM: Alonzo Bradley sraral hya'ga sisyuw na NBA, wal malaxmisuq qaniy la. kawas tay 1953, ryax sa tay 16 nqu tay 10, Alonzo Bradley, biru na p'unro. qnxan nya Bradley htagan beh sa misisipico yotica.sraral ga cyux hopa pqwasan biru ptlubuw. 1977-1980 kawas hiya ga maki Amerika NBA Houston Rockets moyay 99 qnahan. cinkhulan sa knita' sa brbiru' Lists of National Basketball Association players

Alonzo Bradley sraral hya'ga sisyow na NBA, wal malaxmisoq qaniy la. kawas tay 1953, ryax sa tay 16 nqo tay 10, Alonzo Bradley, biro na p'onro. qnxan nya Bradley htagan beh sa misisipico yotica.sraral ga cyox hopa pqwasan biro ptlobow. 1977-1980 kawas hiya ga maki Amerika NBA Hooston Rockets moyay 99 qnahan. cinkholan sa knita' sa brbiro' Lists of National Basketball Association players
